bomberman.core.logic
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.logic.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicPhysicsEntity
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

The Entity class represent a base class of logic objects acting in a LogicWorld. An entity is represented by its State, position and number of lives. A logic entity provides an update(int) method that update its state at each frame as time passes.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava

Method Detail

destroy

public void destroy()
Destroys instantly the Entity and removes it from the EntityEngine.

die

public void die()
The Entity dies, its state and position are reseted. If the number of lives go below 1 the entity is destroyed.

Gets the lives number.
